content:
Nezha takes out the diamond snare from Macaque and inspects the shattered pieces. With a wave of his hand, he uses his magic to repair the diamond snare, making it shine even brighter than before. MK watches in awe as the pieces of the snare float in the air, joining back together like a puzzle.

Macaque looks at the newly restored diamond snare with amazement. "You truly are a powerful celestial being, Nezha," he says, bowing respectfully.

Nezha smiles. "Thank you, Macaque. But it is not I who possess the power, but the divine forces that guide me." He hands the diamond snare back to Macaque. "Take care of this, my friend. It is a powerful tool, and I trust that you will use it wisely."

Macaque nods solemnly, tucking the diamond snare back into his clothes. "I will, Nezha. And I thank you for your help today. We couldn't have done it without you."

Nezha nods in acknowledgement. "It was my pleasure to aid you, Macaque. You are a true hero, and the mortal world is fortunate to have you protecting it."

MK looks up at Macaque, who gives him a warm smile. "And I'm fortunate to have you by my side, MK," he says. "Let's go home."

With that, the trio boards Nezha's chariot and takes off into the sky, leaving the battlefield behind. MK looks back at the chaos and destruction that was the fight, but he feels reassured knowing that there are powerful beings like Macaque and Nezha out there, watching over them.
